channel.title: Events on Young-ISA
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Young-ISA

item.title: Youn-ISA Webinar Joint with the BIR Committee on Statistical Ecology
item.description: This webinar aims to bring together many career-young statisticians in Ireland to focus on the application of statistical ecology.

item.title: 5th Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: The 5th Young-ISA meeting is dedicated to Transferable Skills: Insights from Academia and Industry.

item.title: Young-ISA webinar joint with Bernoulli Society on Bayesian Statistics.
item.description: This webinar aims to bring together many career-young statisticians in Ireland to focus on the application and theoretical development of Bayesian statistics.

item.title: 4th Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: The 4th Young-ISA meeting is dedicated to Researcher’s Toolkit - Publication, Progression, and People.

item.title: 3rd Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: The 3rd Young-ISA meeting is dedicated to Collaborative Workflow in Data Science.

item.title: Young-ISA online workshop on Statistics in Medicine
item.description: This online workshop aims to bring together many career-young statisticians in Ireland to focus on application of statistics in medicine.

item.title: Young-ISA Twitter Poster Conference (#YISAPoster2022)
item.description: This is the 3rd Twitter Poster Conference organised by Young-ISA aims to provide an opportunity for Statisticians and Data Scientists around the world to meet online, share their research and engage in scientific discussion

item.title: Young-ISA Twitter Poster Conference (#YISAPoster2023)
item.description: This is the 4rd Twitter Poster Conference organised by Young-ISA aims to provide an opportunity for Statisticians and Data Scientists around the world to meet online, share their research and engage in scientific discussion

item.title: 2nd Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: The 2nd Young-ISA meeting is dedicated to Communication and Reproducibility in Statistics.

item.title: Young-ISA Twitter Poster Conference (#YISAPoster2020)
item.description: This Twitter Poster Conference aims to provide an opportunity for Statisticians and Data Scientists around the world to meet online, share their research and engage in scientific discussion

item.title: Inaugural Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: This inaugural event will gather together early career statisticians from across Ireland for a series of talks on career development in academia and industry
